ygData.subject: The Turkeys goose is cooked.
ygData.msgSnippet: Bounty shook off his dizzyness and fired his eyebeams at Dark Mouse. I ll yield when I retire. His boasts were legitimate, he actually believed he could

Subject: The Turkeys goose is cooked.

Bounty shook off his dizzyness and fired his eyebeams at Dark 
Mouse. "I'll yield when I retire." His boasts were legitimate, he 
actually believed he could destroy every bot on this planet.

(If you reply I'll wait for Airly then reply to both posts again.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> 
> She ran over and aimed the cannon at Bounty. "You yeild? Or do I 
> roast you here and now?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > OOC Bounty is wearing a temporal space device that makes it 
nearly 
> > impossible for lower technology to hit him. (The bat probes and 
> > autoguns.) Have your main characters fire at him and I'll give 
you 
> a 
> > dinner instead of minor damage.
> > 
> > Bounty ducked, sending Darkmouses blast away from him.
> > The bat probes couldn't get a positive lock on Bounty so they 
> missed. 
> > The shots from B. Nightmare, Mantys, and Wespa bounced off the 
> > spinning Bounty. He stopped to soon and a lone shot struck him in 
> the 
> > side. He stumbled to the side and dropped his blades. Dizzy from 
> all 
> > the spinning he stumbled around VULNERABLE to any attack. His 
> > depleted blasters returned to his side. He tried to see straight 
> but 
> > failed as he staggered against the wall of the Predacon Base.
> > 
> > Finish him at your convenience Airly.
> >
